body_html: Thanks @rdipietro ! I have been able to successfully install r0.12 with Bazel 0.4.3 on a cluster. Some of your suggestions needed to be modified to cater to the changes in the new version of TF and Bazel. But, your suggestions provided a solid starting point. When I get the time, I will write up the changes that I had to make.
